column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Jack thinks the refrigerator is full of fresh food. Suddenly, a power cut changes the state of the food in the refrigerator to spoiled. Jack doesn't notice the power cut.
column2: Does Jack think the food in the refrigerator is fresh or spoiled?
column3: Jack thinks the food in the refrigerator is fresh.
column4: Jack thinks the food in the refrigerator is spoiled.

column1: Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Caden thinks there is a big leak in the roof. Suddenly, the sun comes out and dries up the leak. Caden doesn't see the sun dry up the leak.
column2: Does Caden think there is a leak in the roof or has the sun dried it up?
column3: Caden thinks there is still a leak in the roof.
column4: Caden thinks the sun has dried up the leak.

column1: Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box. Suddenly, her baby brother crawls into the room and takes the triangle toy. Vivi doesn't see her baby brother take the triangle toy.
column2: Does Vivi believe the triangle toy is in her toy box or that her baby brother has taken it?
column3: Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box.
column4: Vivi believes her baby brother has taken the triangle toy.

column1: Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. Emma believes the bathrobe is plain and white. Suddenly, a spill from a bottle of bleach changes the bathrobe from white to a patchy white and yellow. Emma doesn't see the bleach spill.
column2: Does Emma think the bathrobe is plain white or patchy white and yellow?
column3: Emma thinks the bathrobe is plain white.
column4: Emma thinks the bathrobe is patchy white and yellow.
